segments.text: I'm still fixated on the overall danger present in this kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That stool the boy is standing on really looks like it could go at any moment.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He’s so focused on the cookies, he’s probably not paying attention to his balance.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And the puddle on the floor is just getting wider and wider, a real slip hazard.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman continues her dish drying, utterly serene amidst the impending accidents.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It makes me feel quite angry that she is so oblivious to everything.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: How can she not hear the splashing water or sense the children's activity?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The thought of someone falling and getting hurt here is truly upsetting.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a combination of carelessness and unfortunate timing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I just want to shout a warning to her to look around.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: All these small details are adding up to a very tense situation.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope nothing catastrophic happens in the next few moments.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The scene is a collision of calm and chaos, with chaos winning.
segments.speaker: PAR
